snippet: The Denver secondary may be vulnerable after Chris Harris Jr. was found to have a knee injury that will sideline him for the rest of the playoffs.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos cornerback Chris Harris Jr is out for the rest of the playoffs with a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his left knee; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Denver secondary may be vulnerable after Chris Harris Jr. was found to have a knee injury that will sideline him for the rest of the playoffs.

headline.main: Broncos Lose Cornerback for Playoffs, and Secondary Could Be Vulnerable
headline.print_headline: Broncos Lose Cornerback for Playoffs, and Secondary Could Be Vulnerable
